note: In the popular yoga of today there is a general misunderstanding and misconception of the methodology, of the application of spiritual practices. Here at Paramahansa Yoga Swami Chandramani Saraswati , is dedicated to true expanded consciousness through time honored methods that grounds the spiritual seeker in proper yoga sadhana . With the upmost clarity of information for clear, pragmatic understanding and application . " Imagination is the basis for the operating system of Consciousness."
